DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , first-in-human study determine recommend dose IMGN289 adult patient advance EGFR-positive tumor .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study IMGN289 Adult Patients With EGFR-positive Solid Tumors
